name: War Squares
description:
War Squares is an action-packed real-time strategy game featuring hundreds of NPC troops on an open battlefield.

Play as a super-saber-wielding square that helps turn the tide of war against the enemy! With an array of abilities, ranging from spin-jitsu to forcefields, dominate the map and support your troops!

 Build factories to produce units and capture points. Advance your army and destroy their headquarters! Get rich by destroying structures and killing enemies.

There are unique 5 allied units and 5 red enemy units. Each one brings something different to the battlefield, whether it be tanking the death-lasers or sniping the backline and clearing hordes.

When in doubt, if you're struggling to beat waves of grunts, then you can always rely on hiring the big guns.

Some features include:

  • A minimap to get a live overview of the entire battle
  • Multiple difficulties to match your skill level
  • A swooshy glowy sword that you can use to throw and deflect projectiles
  • Your own pre-made base to start producing an army to defend and attack!
  • Time-tracking that tells you how long each game lasted - try to beat your own speedrun records of the game!

An internet connection is not required to play this game as your opponent will be AI-controlled.

PRO TIP: USE THE IN-GAME MENU FOR MORE IN-DEPTH HELP GUIDES AND CONTROLS

This game was made in 40 hours over the course of 7 days. All art and code was created by me, Eapple.
